page.title: 18TRAFFIC CENSUS
page.content: Our school is next to{Leeds and {Bradford Airport.}Most of the other land around the school is farm-land. There are 6 farms and there is a new Garden Centre near the junction of Dean Lane and Otley old road.Our school is not on a bus route but the country lanes are very busy with traffic. We have to be very careful when we walk up to the airport,which is the nearest bus stop. Last Friday we did a traffic census to find out how many vehicles went past our school in half an hour. I counted 46 cars. Leslie counted 12 lorries and vans. Samantha counted 1 motor cycle. Wendy counted 8 taxis. Craig counted 1 Landrover and 1 tractor.We counted a{total of 69 {vehicles in 30 minutes.By Sharon Smith
